title: Set Up a Tuition Payment Plan
description: A student cannot pay their tuition in full and wants to enroll in a monthly payment plan.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their outstanding tuition balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and the amount due.

tasks.description: Explain the available payment plan options, including the number of installments and any service fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the payment plan terms.

tasks.description: Enroll the student in their chosen payment plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully enrolls the student in the 4-month payment plan.
